Homepage.title: Here, find and share information to succeed in your project
Homepage.explication lexique: Check out the glossary to understand words you might see as you read.
Homepage.information vérifiée: Réfugiés.info is transparent about the quality of its information
Homepage.information vérifiée subheader: All contents are proofread and corrected before publication. This will avoid errors and outdated information. Once online, if you see an error, you can easily report it.
Homepage.Faites connaitre subheader: Do you have or do you know of initiatives that promote the integration of refugees? Take part in enriching the site by writing new entries yourself, as on Wikipedia.
Homepage.disponible langues: Réfugiés.info is available in multiple languages
Homepage.disponible langues subheader: Participate in our translation effort to make information more accessible for refugees.
Homepage.contribution subheader: Everyone can participate. The platform is fed directly by associations, volunteers and social workers who work on a daily basis to support refugees.
Homepage.Vous cherchez ?: What are you looking to do?
Homepage.Participer à l'enrichissement du site: Participate in the improvement of the site by writing new entries yourself, like on Wikipedia.
Homepage.Trouver une initiative: Find an initiative, programme or training
Homepage.Lire le lexique: Read the glossary to understand difficult words

Homepage.aidez-nous à taduire subheader: Join a team of volunteer translators and translate at your own pace. Providing information translated into several languages makes it easier for refugees in France to understand the system.

Homepage.Contribuer à la traduction: Contribute to the translation of the website with our user-friendly interface. Join a team of volunteer translators and translate at your own pace.
Homepage.Participe déploiement: I'd like to participate in the deployment
Homepage.Déployez subheader: Réfugiés.info is gradually being rolled out across France thanks to its ambassadors. Do you represent a local authority, the State or an association? Réfugiés.info will map and promote the various schemes in favour of integration in your area.

QuiSommesNous.Mission_1_subheader: Being a refugee means rebuilding a home, a network, and a career. These changes can result in losing one's bearings and ambitions. Réfugiés.info is a tool that allows refugees to reach their life goals more quickly with less stress.
QuiSommesNous.Mission_2_header: Make administrative processes accessible and translated
QuiSommesNous.Mission_2_subheader: Once asylum is granted by French authorities, refugees enter into common law, which brings about new administrative procedures. Réfugiés.info publishes practical information to make these procedures accessible. It also brings together volunteers to translate these procedures into different languages
QuiSommesNous.Mission_3_header: Identify support systems throughout the country
QuiSommesNous.Mission_3_subheader: Many programs have emerged in France to welcome and accompany refugees. These programs can suffer from a lack of publicity so may not benefit the greatest number of people. Réfugiés.info's mission is to shine a light on these programs and make them accessible
QuiSommesNous.problem_1_subheader: Better understanding fosters better welcoming. The words "migrant", "asylum seeker", or "refugee" can all have different definitions. Réfugiés.info is designed for statutory refugees, meaning people to whom France has granted international protection because their lives are threatened in their country of origin
QuiSommesNous.problem_2_subheader: Constant legislative evolution, multiplying organizations, and administrative complexity make it difficult to understand one's rights and duties. Réfugiés.info centralizes reliable, up-to-date, accessible information for this reason.
QuiSommesNous.problem_3_header2: Avoid breaks in the support system
QuiSommesNous.problem_3_subheader2: Moving, changing life project... With each new partner, you have to start from scratch. Réfugiés.info purports to offer refugees the opportunity to create a personal journey that they can easily share with their caregivers.
QuiSommesNous.contributive_1_subheader: Openness and transparency are at the core of Réfugiés.info. The source code of the site is publicly available. An open network helps identity needs and propose new solutions
QuiSommesNous.contributive_2_subheader: People on the ground are best able to identify and list local actions. Réfugiés.info allows different geographic areas to identify and promote their initiatives -- and to discover new ones
QuiSommesNous.contributive_3_subheader: By giving everyone the opportunity to easily contribute to the platform, like on Wikipedia, Réfugiés.info promotes new forms of micro-engagement, allowing new people to get involved in the support of refugees
QuiSommesNous.subheader2: implemented by the Diair and developed by the Mednum
QuiSommesNous.recenser-description: Numerous devices are emerging in France to welcome and support refugees. These devices may not be visible enough and may not benefit enough people. Réfugiés.info's mission is to identify and make both visible and accessible these many initiatives
QuiSommesNous.vulgariser-description: As soon as they are granted international protection, refugees access common law, which triggers numerous administrative procedures. Réfugiés.info publishes practical sheets to popularise these procedures and gathers volunteers to translate them into the main languages of integration.
QuiSommesNous.parcours-description: Obtaining asylum mainly means rebuilding. A home, a network, a vocation. Having to leave one's country often confuses one's bearings, ambitions and objectives. Réfugiés.info offers a structuring tool allowing refugees to reach their life goals faster and more serenely.
QuiSommesNous.appel-a-manifestation1: These organisations have signed a Call for Expression of Interest and participate in the evolution of the platform.
QuiSommesNous.appel-a-manifestation2: If you represent an organisation linked to the integration of refugees and wish to join the adventure, download the call below and send it to nour@refugies.info. We will contact you to define the terms of our partnership.

ModaleNiveauDeFrançais.Ces niveaux sont issus du: These levels are derived from the
ModaleNiveauDeFrançais.Je découvre le français description: I can understand and use familiar everyday expressions and very basic phrases aimed at satisfying basic needs.
ModaleNiveauDeFrançais.Je comprends des messages simples descri: I can understand sentences and expressions related to my immediate environment: family, work, school. I can talk about familiar subjects.
ModaleNiveauDeFrançais.Je communique avec des francophones desc: I can understand the main points of a message when clear, standard language is used. I can communicate in most travelling situations. I can recount an event or an experience.
ModaleNiveauDeFrançais.Je communique avec aisance description: I can understand the main content of complex messages on both concrete and abstract topics. I can communicate with ease with a native speaker and express myself clearly and comprehensively on a wide range of subjects.
